document.full_text: the shelling of a market in abidjan on thursday, which killed at least 25 people and wounded 40, may be a crime against humanity, the united nations said friday.
document.title: africa: ivory coast: attack on market may be war crime, u.n. says
lines_and_colors: the shelling of a market in abidjan on thursday, which killed at least 25 people and wounded 40, may be a crime against humanity, the united nations said friday.
